docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Nov. 23 -- The Legation of Uruguay established here last Summer promises to take a more conspicuous place in the gayety of nations as seen in the course of a Washington season than might be expected from its importance and recent entrance...
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Nov. 23 -- The Legation of Uruguay established here last Summer promises to take a more conspicuous place in the gayety of nations as seen in the course of a Washington season than might be expected from its importance and recent entrance into the diplomatic body.

headline.main: WANTS AN AMERICAN WIFE.; Handsome Young Minister from Uruguay Will Entertain Lavishly.

byline.original: Special to The New York Times

docs.snippet: Prank G. Carpenter, who is well known to the reading public through his newspaper work and books of travel, some of which are used in their schools as reading books, has prepared another interesting volume, the outcome of a 25,000-mile journalistic...
docs.lead_paragraph: Prank G. Carpenter, who is well known to the reading public through his newspaper work and books of travel, some of which are used in their schools as reading books, has prepared another interesting volume, the outcome of a 25,000-mile journalistic expedition to South America, in search of information for the American business man and general reader.
docs.abstract: Carpenter, Frank G.; "South America; Social, Industrial, and Political."

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: BOOK REVIEWS -- TIMES'S ARTICLES, CORRESPONDENTS' LETTERS

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Dec. 13 -- The report of the Director at the Mint on the production of gold and silver in the United States during the calendar year 1899 shows only slight variation from the approximate figures given out early to the present year. The...
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Dec. 13 -- The report of the Director at the Mint on the production of gold and silver in the United States during the calendar year 1899 shows only slight variation from the approximate figures given out early to the present year. The final figures are $71,053,400 for gold and $32,858,700 for silver at its average commercial value during the year.
docs.abstract: Mint Director G. E. Roberts; Report of Gold and Silver Production of United States and World

headline.main: GOLD AND SILVER PRODUCTION.; $71,053,400 of Former and $32,858,700 of Latter in This Country Last Year -- Figures for the World.

docs.snippet: SLIGHT INCREASE IN THE POPULATION OF FRANCE. -- The fact that until 1897 for several years the birth rate in France had shown no great gain over the death rate created considerable discussion among sociologists, and even legislation was resorted to...
docs.lead_paragraph: SLIGHT INCREASE IN THE POPULATION OF FRANCE. -- The fact that until 1897 for several years the birth rate in France had shown no great gain over the death rate created considerable discussion among sociologists, and even legislation was resorted to in order to remedy certain phases of the general tendency.
